name: Back to Reality (mpdeakin)
description:
Back to Reality puts the player in the role of REALM GUARDIAN. In the CYBER dimension, the player will destroy portals, pull off awesome combos, and, most importantly, kill CYBERMEN!

Stop the elevator portals from reaching the top of the map by pressing RMB to SLAM them back into the dimension they came from!

Utilize your jump and dash abilities to run circles (uh, more like squares) around the enemies of REALITY!

This game was made in a week for the 2018 Epic Mega Jam.

NOTE: There was a bug built into the packaged version of the game that didn't show up until it was too late. Unfortunately you can hardly control your character (the W, A, S, and D keys don't respond). I have since, however, fixed the bug. If you want to be able to play it properly, use this link: 

(https://www.dropbox.com/s/viqrw2yw1upcfba/BackToRealityPrototype.rar?dl=0)

DO NOT RATE THIS VERSION OF THE GAME FOR THE EPIC MEGA JAM. Use the originally uploaded file for that.
